Episodes.Title: Salty's Secret
Episodes.Plot: Salty proves himself when given a dull assignment.

Episodes.Title: Harvey to the Rescue
Episodes.Plot: Harvey, a crane engine, arrives; the engines think he looks strange, so Percy will not allow him to take his mail. Harvey rescues Percy after an accident.

Episodes.Title: No Sleep for Cranky
Episodes.Plot: Cranky causes an accident while unloading his cargo, trapping Salty, Bill, and Ben at the docks; Salty passes the time by telling stories to the twins.

Episodes.Title: A Bad Day for Harold the Helicopter
Episodes.Plot: Harold the helicopter and Percy both like delivering mail.

Episodes.Title: Elizabeth the Vintage Lorry
Episodes.Plot: Thomas is pulling a special to Brendam. It is heavy, and he is puffing so hard, that his siderods fall off. Thomas' crew see an old disused shed, which Thomas thinks is haunted. But instead of finding a ghost inside, Thomas' crew discover a vintage Sentinel lorry named Elizabeth.

Episodes.Title: The Fogman
Episodes.Plot: The Fat Controller has replaced Cyril the fogman with a foghorn.

Episodes.Title: Jack Jumps In
Episodes.Plot: Thomas takes an eager front-loader named Jack to help the Pack clear ground for railway lines at the quarry. Jack looks for his work, and finally finds it, working with a small excavator called Alfie. Then, a dump truck called Max comes along, and causes dust to fly over the machines.

Episodes.Title: A Friend in Need
Episodes.Plot: Ned the steam shovel accidentally rolls over Thomas' track.

Episodes.Title: It's Only Snow
Episodes.Plot: Thomas has to take a Christmas Tree to the mountain village with Toby, and is very angry when he has to wear his old snowplough. During the journey to take the village, however, it gets hit by a rock on the track.

Episodes.Title: Twin Trouble
Episodes.Plot: Donald and Douglas are chuffing down the line with a goods train. Trevor struggles with a cart of hay, which gets stuck on a crossing after one of the wheels of the cart falls off. Donald sees the cart, but they can't stop, and Donald hits the cart but blames Douglas.

Episodes.Title: The World's Strongest Engine
Episodes.Plot: The Fat Controller decides to use Diesel when Henry breaks down.

Episodes.Title: Scaredy Engines
Episodes.Plot: Edward's spooky ghost stories scare Percy on Halloween.

Episodes.Title: Percy and the Haunted Mine
Episodes.Plot: Percy must collect some shrubs from Maithwaite for a competition.
